pullRequest.title: Add support for null format property of Hive tables
pullRequest.bodyText:
Allow Presto to correctly read from exernal Hive tables that use serialization.null.format to sotre NULL in an alternate format.
This works with TEXTFILE, RCTEXT, and SEQUENCEFILE formats. There are no tests for the latter two (because they can't be easily embedded in the tests because they are binary file formats and Presto can't insert data into external Hive tables).

commit.message: Clean up Optional handling in HiveMetadata.doGetTableMetadata
Use serdeConstants for header/footer skip property keys

nodes.bodyText: Please pass string as value for parameter for statement to look valid.

We are rarely doing javadoc comments in the codebase as they tend to get out of sync with the code.
I would drop this one as method name and parameters are self-explanatory enough.

nodes.bodyText: The Also, add a separate test for the default field delimiter should be extracted to separate commit.

I have just notice that it would be nicer to move this refactoring commit before "Add null format property to Hive textfile tables".
And then only add testCreateExternalTableWithNullFormat in new form.
Now we are adding testCreateExternalTableWithNullFormat and then refactoring it in followup commit.
It is nice to have. But not a must do.

commit.message: Reduce code duplication in tests for external textfile Hive tables
Add separate test for external Hive table with field separator
Add null format property to Hive textfile tables
Reduce code duplication in Hive integration tests

afterCommit.message: Reduce code duplication in Hive integration tests
